FundingAwardAmendment.name: FundingAwardAmendment
FundingAwardAmendment.description: Represents a modification to the scope or finances of a previously approved award. This object is available in API version 57.0 and later.

AdjustedAwardAmount.description: The actual amount that's approved for adjustment in the funding award amount.

AdjustedEndDate.description: The actual date of adjustment to the end date of the funding award.

ApprovalStatus.description: Specifies the approval status of the requested adjustment.

Comments.description: The comment about the approval or rejection of the adjustment request.

ContractId.description: The amended contract related to this funding award amendment.

FundingAwardId.description: The funding award that's associated with the contract that's adjusted.

IsSubmitted.description: Indicates whether the amendment to the funding award has been submitted (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.

Name.description: The name of amendment for the funding award.

ProposedAwardAmount.description: The amount of adjustment requested in the award amount.

ProposedEndDate.description: The requested change to the End Date of the funding award.

Reason.description: The reason for the adjustment requested in the contract.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the adjustment request.
